医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员开发数学模型来预测癌症治疗的有效剂量范围由于耐药性的发展和复发的可能性，癌症带来了重大挑战。耐药性可能源于癌细胞的永久性遗传变化或治疗引起的癌细胞行为的非遗传改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Researchers-develop-mathematical-model-to-predict- effective-dosage-range-of-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Researchers-develop-mathematical-model-to-predict- effective-dosage-range-of-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cde580d-1f09-4c8f-96fe-a34b5614bb73 Tue, 28 May 2024 07:46:59 -0400 Researchers develop mathematical model to predict effective dosage range of cancer treatment
报告显示，残疾人更容易出现妊娠并发症残疾人占安大略省所有怀孕者的 13%，但一份新报告显示，这一人群更有可能出现妊娠并发症，如急诊、住院和早产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/People-with-disability-more-likely-to-experience-pregnancy-complications-report-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/People-with-disability-more-likely-to-experience-pregnancy-complications-report-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54fa71cc-5ee6-4e96-860c-8c97c6de3827 Tue, 28 May 2024 07:30:55 -0400 People with disabilities more likely to experience pregnancy complications, report shows
创新汗液监测装置实现无创健康监测汗液中含有生物标志物，可以监测从糖尿病到遗传性疾病等各种健康状况。与血液采集不同，汗液采样因其无痛性质而受到用户的青睐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Innovative-sweat-monitoring-device-enables-non-guarantee-health-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Innovative-sweat-monitoring-device-enables-non-guarantee-health-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=180978f9-cbe8-46c0-a917-d954e7fefae5 Tue, 28 May 2024 07:01:51 -0400 Innovative sweat monitoring device enables non-invasive health monitoring
应对痴呆症患者攻击行为的新帮助照顾患有痴呆症的老年人压力很大，尤其是当他们变得具有身体或语言攻击性、离家出走、出现偏执或幻觉、做出不恰当或重复的行为，或者拒绝让护理人员帮助他们时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-help-for-dealing-with-aggression-in-people-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-help-for-dealing-with-aggression-in-people-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=476aac41-8f3e-4c94-9c8f-0ebd06b2278e Tue, 28 May 2024 06:27:04 -0400 New help for dealing with aggression in people with dementia
研究称每周服用一次索马鲁肽可能会降低患肾脏疾病的风险索马鲁肽（每周给药一次）对肾脏疾病结果的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Taking-semaglutide-once-weekly-may-lower-the-chances-of-kidney-disease-says-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Taking-semaglutide-once-weekly-may-lower-the-chances-of-kidney-disease-says-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59ed40ea-2298-4f82-81eb-8bd42d3e877e Tue, 28 May 2024 06:12:00 -0400 Taking semaglutide once weekly may lower the chances of kidney disease, says study
改变研发格局，从头开始取得临床成功在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 Revvity 的 Amanda Jones 讨论了可用于彻底改变临床研究研发格局的策略和解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Changing-the-landscape-of-RD-to-build-clinical-success-from-the-ground-up.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Changing-the-landscape-of-RD-to-build-clinical-success-from-the-ground-up.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3eef38db-da7b-4a6e-908b-1079243e9f0e Tue, 28 May 2024 05:21:00 -0400 Changing the landscape of R&D to build clinical success from the ground up
研究揭示红斑痤疮和恶性黑色素瘤之间的显着联系红斑痤疮是一种常见的皮肤病，被广泛认为只是一个美容问题，可能与多种合并症有关，包括黑色素瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Study-reveals-significant-link- Between-rosacea-and-malignant-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Study-reveals-significant-link- Between-rosacea-and-malignant-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94f85177-a2ce-4744-abf9-fc540f0a8f54 Tue, 28 May 2024 05:08:00 -0400 Study reveals significant link between rosacea and malignant melanoma
Exonate 任命 Rafiq Hasan 博士为非执行董事Exonate Ltd. 是一家为视网膜血管疾病患者开发新型非侵入性小分子疗法的生物技术公司，今天宣布扩大董事会规模，任命 Rafiq Hasan 博士为非执行董事。拉菲克在全球制药企业工作多年，带来了眼科领域的丰富专业知识，特别是糖尿病眼病领域的专业知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Exonate-appoints-Dr-Rafiq-Hasan-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Exonate-appoints-Dr-Rafiq-Hasan-as-Non-Executive-Director.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f571c30-4e0a-47f5-90a7-16453247800a Tue, 28 May 2024 05:01:00 -0400 Exonate appoints Dr Rafiq Hasan as Non-Executive Director
研究表明长途飞行中强制佩戴口罩可防止 SARS-CoV-2 传播最近的一项研究表明，不强制佩戴口罩的长途飞行会显着增加 SARS-CoV-2 传播的风险，而在长途航班上强制佩戴口罩可有效防止飞行中传播。研究结果强调了佩戴口罩执法对于减少飞机上 COVID-19 传播的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Study-shows-enforced-masking-on-long-flights-prevents-SARS-CoV-2-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Study-shows-enforced-masking-on-long-flights-prevents-SARS-CoV-2-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4df8b9c6-4148-4bf2-89db-dfeb0d56ae97 Tue, 28 May 2024 01:32:00 -0400 Study shows enforced masking on long flights prevents SARS-CoV-2 transmission
研究表明，心力衰竭通过改变干细胞引发多种疾病研究人员发现，心力衰竭 (HF) 通过改变造血干细胞 (HSC) 产生促炎性巨噬细胞，从而增加多个器官的脆弱性，从而促进多种疾病的发生。该研究强调了抑制的 TGF-β 信号在这些改变中的作用，从而导致慢性炎症和随后的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Heart-failure-triggers-multimorbidity-by-altering-stem-cells-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Heart-failure-triggers-multimorbidity-by-altering-stem-cells-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=529d0575-60c7-4a62-b510-f19a57ca2508 Tue, 28 May 2024 01:16:00 -0400 Heart failure triggers multimorbidity by altering stem cells, study reveals
